Name: Barbaric Stamina
Description: When you score a Heavy or Critical Hit against a creature OR if either is scored against you, you regain half of your SP, if you didn't spend SP as part of the action.

Name: Rage
Description: During Combat, you can spend 1 AP and 1 SP to enter a rage for 1 minute. For the duration, you gain the following effects: - You deal +1 damage on Melee Attacks. - You have ADV on Might Checks and Saves. - Your AC decreases by 5. - You gain Resistance (1/2) to Physical Damage. Your Rage ends if you fall Unconscious, die, or you choose to end it for free on your turn.

Name: Unarmored Warrior
Description: - You gain the following AV when not wearing Armor: 8 + Combat Proficiency + (Dexterity or Might) + 2 - While not wearing Armor, you have +1 Move

Name: Agressive Striker
Description: - Charge: When you mae a Melee Attack on your turn, you can move up to 2 Spaces immediately before making the Attack - Migty Leap: You can use your Might instead of Dexterity to determine Jump Distance and the damage you take from Falling
